channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-10746] Bump the version of HTrace to 3.0
item.description: Upgrading the version of HTrace from 2.04 to 3.0. The package name has been changed from org.cloudera.htrace to org.htrace.
item.summary: Bump the version of HTrace to 3.0

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Let me make a 3.0.1 release Masatake Iwasaki There is a bug fix and a few of your pull requests since 3.0
Thanks for the udpate stack! I'm waiting the release.

I made a new htrace 3.0.3 release (it should have been 3.0.1 but I kept mangling the tagging).

The new htrace has a small bug fix and some doc improvements by Masatake Iwasaki. The package name has changed also from org.cloudera.htrace to org.htrace. Update the package references everywhere.

Masatake Iwasaki We could if we had to put this patch in 0.96 and 0.98 since it unlikely folks are using it there but would be cleaner if we did not have to backport this to earlier versions (so I've removed the 0.96 and 0.98 for now)

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12635944/10746.txt
against trunk revision .
ATTACHMENT ID: 12635944

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 12 new or modified tests.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

-1 javac. The patch appears to cause mvn compile goal to fail.

-1 findbugs. The patch appears to cause Findbugs (version 1.3.9) to fail.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 lineLengths. The patch does not introduce lines longer than 100

-1 site. The patch appears to cause mvn site goal to fail.

-1 core tests. The patch failed these unit tests:

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/9057//testReport/
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/9057//console
